data.text:
I came to Tracen Academy a few 
days ago in order to train Uma Musume.
data.processed:
󠁿I came to Tracen Academy a few 
󠁿days ago in order to train Uma Musume.

data.text:
I also received a personal trainer's office, 
and as such I was looking over some files there…
data.processed:
󠁿I also received a personal trainer's office, 
󠁿and as such I was looking over some files there…

data.text:
Fuee… This place is so nice… No one's here and it's quiet. 
Plus there's a soft and fluffy sofa there all for me!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Fuee… This place is so nice… No one's here and it's quiet. 
󠁿Plus there's a soft and fluffy sofa there all for me!

data.text: So I'll be helping myself to…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿So I'll be helping myself to…

data.text:
Wait, who are you!? 
Why are you here!?
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: I could ask you the same!
I could ask you the same!

data.processed:
󠁿Wait, who are you!? 
󠁿Why are you here!?

data.text:
This empty Trainer's Office is 
Sei-chan's precious naptime spot. Wait…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿This empty Trainer's Office is 
󠁿Sei-chan's precious naptime spot. Wait…

data.text:
That badge… could it be… are you a rookie trainer? 
And if so, did they tell you you could use this office?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿That badge… could it be… are you a rookie trainer? 
󠁿And if so, did they tell you you could use this office?

data.text: Ah, okay. So that's what happened, got it!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, okay. So that's what happened, got it!

data.text:
Well anyways, I'll be borrowing that sofa over there. 
Today's class was real rough, and now I'm just so sleepy.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Well anyways, I'll be borrowing that sofa over there. 
󠁿Today's class was real rough, and now I'm just so sleepy.

data.text: So, I'll be taking a nap.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿So, I'll be taking a nap.

data.text:
Without waiting for my response, this Uma Musume… 
Seiun Sky, lied down on the sofa and drifted off to sleep.
data.processed:
󠁿Without waiting for my response, this Uma Musume… 
󠁿Seiun Sky, lied down on the sofa and drifted off to sleep.

data.text:
At any rate, I covered her with a blanket that I 
had in my office so she wouldn't catch a cold.
data.processed:
󠁿At any rate, I covered her with a blanket that I 
󠁿had in my office so she wouldn't catch a cold.

data.text: Fuwa… That was a great nap…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Fuwa… That was a great nap…

data.text: Wait, who are you!?
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: I told you I'm a trainer!

data.processed: 󠁿Wait, who are you!?

data.text:
Ahaha, I was just kidding. 
Thanks for the blanket though.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha, I was just kidding. 
󠁿Thanks for the blanket though.

data.text:
Also… Trainer-san? 
Why didn't you try and wake me up?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Also… Trainer-san? 
󠁿Why didn't you try and wake me up?

data.text:
I was obviously taking advantage of this 
empty room so that I could slack off in school. 
Then, I just fell asleep in front of you.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿I was obviously taking advantage of this 
󠁿empty room so that I could slack off in school. 
󠁿Then, I just fell asleep in front of you.

data.text:
I can't believe I'm saying this but, 
it'd be normal for you to kick me out saying 
something like "stop messing around," don't you think?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿I can't believe I'm saying this but, 
󠁿it'd be normal for you to kick me out saying 
󠁿something like "stop messing around," don't you think?

data.text:
So then why did you bring me a blanket 
and watch over me as I slept?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿So then why did you bring me a blanket 
󠁿and watch over me as I slept?

data.text: Ohoho… I get it now.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Ohoho… I get it now.

data.text:
Yup, that's gotta be it! 
Well, thanks for today♪
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Yup, that's gotta be it! 
󠁿Well, thanks for today♪

data.text:
I'll be sure to return this favor… 
if I remember it that is.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿I'll be sure to return this favor… 
󠁿if I remember it that is.

data.text:
So see ya later… 
and let's meet again, okay♪
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿So see ya later… 
󠁿and let's meet again, okay♪

data.text: As she said this, Seiun Sky left the room.
data.processed: 󠁿As she said this, Seiun Sky left the room.

data.text: And a few days after that happened…
data.processed: 󠁿And a few days after that happened…

data.text:
Ah, there you are! Oi, you're the rookie trainer 
from before! This is bad, really really bad!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, there you are! Oi, you're the rookie trainer 
󠁿from before! This is bad, really really bad!

data.text:
Things are really bad, so I'll tell you 
the details later, just answer me this!!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Things are really bad, so I'll tell you 
󠁿the details later, just answer me this!!

data.text:
Are the two organs on either side of your 
chest that you use to breathe called lungs!?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Are the two organs on either side of your 
󠁿chest that you use to breathe called lungs!?

data.text:
You're too quiet! Stop answering with a 
question and use your outside voice instead!!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿You're too quiet! Stop answering with a 
󠁿question and use your outside voice instead!!

data.text: Now say it one more time!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Now say it one more time!

data.text:
Now that's better! 
Just one more time now!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Now that's better! 
󠁿Just one more time now!

data.text:
So as I was saying Sensei, 
this person is my trainer!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿So as I was saying Sensei, 
󠁿this person is my trainer!

data.text:
I was wondering why you suddenly ran off… 
but I see, so they're your trainer.
data.name: Teacher A
data.processed:
󠁿I was wondering why you suddenly ran off… 
󠁿but I see, so they're your trainer.

data.text:
So, Trainer-san. We are immensely appreciative of you 
for choosing Sky-san… We leave her in your care!!
data.name: Teacher A
data.processed:
󠁿So, Trainer-san. We are immensely appreciative of you 
󠁿for choosing Sky-san… We leave her in your care!!

data.text:
Now then, Seiun Sky-san. 
I would like to congratulate you on finding a trainer.
data.name: Teacher A
data.processed:
󠁿Now then, Seiun Sky-san. 
󠁿I would like to congratulate you on finding a trainer.

data.text:
Ahaha, thank you, thank you. 
Alrighty then Sensei, see you later.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha, thank you, thank you. 
󠁿Alrighty then Sensei, see you later.

data.text: And just like that!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿And just like that!

data.text:
You and I are now trainer 
and Uma Musume. Come on, clap!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿You and I are now trainer 
󠁿and Uma Musume. Come on, clap!

data.text:
Oi, how scandalous. As they say, 
simply a means to an end, ya know?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Oi, how scandalous. As they say, 
󠁿simply a means to an end, ya know?

data.text:
More importantly, I was kinda hoping you'd interpret what I did 
as me "doing this only because I wanted to work with you no 
matter what" or something like that.
data.name: Seiun Sky

choices.text: But why me of all people…?
But why me of all people…?

data.processed:
󠁿More importantly, I was kinda hoping you'd interpret what I did 
󠁿as me "doing this only because I wanted to work with you no 
󠁿matter what" or something like that.

data.text: Eh? Do I really have to spell it out for you?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Eh? Do I really have to spell it out for you?

data.text: It was love at first sight! Kyaha ☆
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿It was love at first sight! Kyaha ☆

data.text:
I'm just messing with you… 
But the truth is the way you acted the other 
day in the Trainer's Office really surprised me.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿I'm just messing with you… 
󠁿But the truth is the way you acted the other 
󠁿day in the Trainer's Office really surprised me.

data.text:
Plus this isn't a half bad arrangement 
for a rookie trainer like yourself!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Plus this isn't a half bad arrangement 
󠁿for a rookie trainer like yourself!

data.text: Yup. After all… training me is super easy!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Yup. After all… training me is super easy!

data.text:
I'm not looking for you to be super into your 
training or for you to make a special training 
regime or anything annoying like that.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿I'm not looking for you to be super into your 
󠁿training or for you to make a special training 
󠁿regime or anything annoying like that.

data.text:
Everything should be done in moderation after all. 
That's the philosophy Sei-chan lives her life by anyways.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Everything should be done in moderation after all. 
󠁿That's the philosophy Sei-chan lives her life by anyways.

data.text:
So… let's just relax and take 
this slow and comfortably… Oh!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿So… let's just relax and take 
󠁿this slow and comfortably… Oh!

data.text:
I got swept along and 
ended up signing on as her trainer…!
data.processed:
󠁿I got swept along and 
󠁿ended up signing on as her trainer…!

data.text: And on the first day of training with Seiun Sky…
data.processed: 󠁿And on the first day of training with Seiun Sky…

data.text: (Bzz, bzz)
data.processed: 󠁿(Bzz, bzz)

data.text:
I received a text, so I opened 
my phone to see the message, but…
data.processed:
󠁿I received a text, so I opened 
󠁿my phone to see the message, but…

data.text:
"Trainer-san, I've got big news! I just saw a huge school of 
fish in the floodplains! It would be a disgrace for a master 
fisher such as myself to miss out on this!"
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿"Trainer-san, I've got big news! I just saw a huge school of 
󠁿fish in the floodplains! It would be a disgrace for a master 
󠁿fisher such as myself to miss out on this!"

data.text:
"P.S. I won't be at today's training. 
From Seiun Sky ☆"
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿"P.S. I won't be at today's training. 
󠁿From Seiun Sky ☆"

data.text:
She didn't even show 
up on the first day of training…
data.processed:
󠁿She didn't even show 
󠁿up on the first day of training…

title: Like a Cloud Drifting Through the Sky
